Bash(git tag -a v2.6.1 -m "AIRP v2.6.1 - Transaction Type Templates & Validation

Critical accounting control fix preventing incorrect journal entries.

Issue:
- AR Invoice allowed arbitrary debit/credit combinations
- Users could post accounting nonsense (DR Expenses, CR Cash for AR invoice)
- No validation of transaction type patterns

Fix:
- Auto-populated templates for each transaction type
- AR Invoice: DR 1200 (AR), CR 4000 (Revenue), CR 2130 (VAT)
- AP Invoice: DR 5100 (Expense), DR 2130 (VAT), CR 2100 (AP)
- Validation enforces correct account patterns
- Clear error messages if pattern violated

Impact:
- Prevents accounting errors
- Ensures GAAP/IFRS compliance
- Guides users to correct accounting treatment
- Maintains data integrity")
